snippet.title: Arbor - First Alpha Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Arbor is out now!! First Alpha Release!!
A Roguelike made to punish your every mistake and is made to be very challenging! Massively inspired by other Indie titles (ex: Hollow Knight, Spelunker, Soul Knight)
With a High Score system and an infinite amount of levels similar to Old School Arcade Games, find out how you stack up against players from around the world!

Try Arbor out now!
- on Itch.io : https://donutdaearth.itch.io/arbor
- on GameJolt : https://gamejolt.com/games/arbor/632863

Arbor is made by a single Indie Developer (DonutDaEarth),  Check him out on his other socials while you're at it!
